title: Warren and Sanders, Policy Mates
text:
Bernie Sanders wants voters to know that he—not Elizabeth Warren—is the bona fide socialist running for President in 2020. “There are differences between Elizabeth and myself,” Mr. Sanders said Sunday on ABC. “Elizabeth I think, as you know, has said that she is a capitalist through her bones. I’m not.”

As he falls in the polls, Mr. Sanders has to do something to reignite that 2016 fire. But the Vermont Senator’s problem is that Ms. Warren has co-opted more or less all of his important policy proposals. True-blue socialists...
description: Their differences are mainly about rhetorical labeling.
